recommended_degree: Teknik Sipil, Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in estimating project costs, preparing Material Take-Off (MTO) and Bill of Quantity to ensure accuracy in project planning.
- Support the preparation, review, and weekly update of subcontract plans.
- Participate in bid evaluations and assist in subcontract administration activities.
- Draft LOIs, Service Agreements, Service Orders, and subcontract documents.
- Maintain accurate and timely contract documentation in line with budget and project requirements.
- Support the project team in ensuring smooth and successful project execution.
